skins.shipDescription: Kongou-class fast battleship number one C Kongou.
skins.selfIntroduction: Nameship of the Fast Battleships, flagship of the 7th Combined Fleet, and the last Sakura capital ship to be laid down overseas - that is me, Kongou!
skins.acquisition: I am Kongou, lead ship of the Kongou-class battlecruisers. I shall illuminate the path that leads to victory!
skins.login: Have you had enough rest? The fleet now awaits your orders.
skins.details: The only value of war is the peace that follows it. I implore you to never forget this.
skins.secretaryIdle1: No way in hell a battleship like me is going to get taken out by some flimsy torpedo!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Come! Let's destroy our enemies, pass through that measly canal, and return to the land where I was born!
skins.secretaryIdle3: I take myself too seriously? No, you take yourself too lightly!
skins.secretaryIdle4: Horns? Oh, these things? They're just decorations on the hat. I wouldn't look much like a member of the Sakura Empire without them, right?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Hey you, don't tell me you've been subjecting my sisters to such depravity as well!?

skins.shipDescription: We must fully live in the present, whether during work or during leisure - this is my mantra. Commander, shall we go for an outing together?
skins.acquisition: We must fully live in the present, whether during work or during leisure - this is my mantra. Commander, shall we go for an outing together?
skins.login: Commander, are you well rested? There are still many hours to go.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, a break is not a break if you're constantly thinking about work. Besides, don't you think it's rude to be so preoccupied when you're supposed to be spending time with me?
skins.secretaryIdle2: I'm used to always going out with my sisters, so to be able to spend time with you outside is rather novel for me.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, when the weather gets a bit warmer, why don't we go enjoy the cherry blossoms with my sisters?
skins.secretaryTouch: You're awestruck by my beauty? Hehe, something as obvious as that needs not even be said~
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: You... perhaps you're going to need a remedial course in basic etiquette.

skins.shipDescription: "Celebrity Endorsement of the Port Medical Facilities"... Hehehe, you've made a wise decision picking me. Commander, I can leave the ad shoot to you, right?
